snippet.title: Wildcard | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The Official Wildcard Trailer

Welcome to the official trailer of Wildcard, the ultimate PvP strategic action game. Discover the thrill of building decks, summoning powerful companions, and dominating dynamic arenas with your Champions! Wildcard is a first-of-its-kind hybrid of real-time strategy, arena-based MOBAs, and collectible card games, all powered by cutting-edge technology. Witness the pulse-pounding mix of action and strategy in our NEW trailer.

What is Wildcard? 

Wildcard is a PvP strategic action game where players collect and build decks of cards that summon powerful companions, who then fight alongside their Champions in dynamic arenas surrounded by live and interactive fans and spectators. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the genre, Wildcard offers a unique and immersive gaming experience.


Want to stay up to date on all things Wildcard? Follow Wildcard for the latest:

Website / https://www.wildcardgame.com/ 
Discord / https://discord.com/invite/playwildcard 
Instagram / https://www.instagram.com/playwildcard/ 
Youtube / https://www.youtube.com/@playwildcard 
X / https://x.com/PlayWildcard 
Magic Eden / https://magiceden.io/collections/polygon/wildpass
